about.intro: I am a front-end developer and a UI designer.
about.first-paragraph: With a passion for design and interaction, my goal is to create websites and apps with a high quality design and user experience. I started front-end development 2 years ago with React.js in Paris during various experiences (web magazine, telephone operator, luxury e-commerce website).
about.second-paragraph: I love participating in new projects : I am looking for missions that could bring me the opportunity to code apps from scratch and also create their identity and design.

contact.availability: Available in April 2020 for freelance missions
